entries.message: Initializer agent started - setting up project foundation
Initializer agent completed - project foundation established
Starting work on feature: Initialize Flutter project with proper structure, pubspec.yaml dependencies (provider, hive, home_widget, uuid, intl, google_fonts, flutter_animate), and basic configuration
Feature completed: Initialize Flutter project with proper structure, pubspec.yaml dependencies (provider, hive, home_widget, uuid, intl, google_fonts, flutter_animate), and basic configuration
Starting work on feature: Implement feature-based folder structure: lib/core/, lib/features/affirmations/, lib/features/settings/, lib/features/onboarding/, lib/widgets/native_widget/
Feature completed: Implement feature-based folder structure: lib/core/, lib/features/affirmations/, lib/features/settings/, lib/features/onboarding/, lib/widgets/native_widget/
Starting work on feature: Configure Hive for local storage with proper initialization, type adapters for Affirmation model, and platform-specific paths
Feature completed: Configure Hive for local storage with proper initialization, type adapters for Affirmation model, and platform-specific paths
Starting work on feature: Set up Provider/Riverpod for state management with AffirmationProvider and SettingsProvider
Feature completed: Set up Provider/Riverpod for state management with AffirmationProvider and SettingsProvider
Starting work on feature: Create Affirmation class with id (UUID), text (max 280 chars), createdAt, updatedAt, displayCount, isActive fields. Include Hive type adapter
Feature completed: Create Affirmation class with id (UUID), text (max 280 chars), createdAt, updatedAt, displayCount, isActive fields. Include Hive type adapter
Starting work on feature: Implement functionality to create new affirmations with free-form text input, character limit validation (280 chars), and UUID generation
Feature completed: Implement functionality to create new affirmations with free-form text input, character limit validation (280 chars), and UUID generation
Starting work on feature: Implement functionality to edit existing affirmations, updating the updatedAt timestamp and preserving other metadata
Feature completed: Implement functionality to edit existing affirmations, updating the updatedAt timestamp and preserving other metadata
Starting work on feature: Implement functionality to delete affirmations with confirmation dialog
Feature completed: Implement functionality to delete affirmations with confirmation dialog
Starting work on feature: Implement functionality to view all saved affirmations in a scrollable list with proper empty state handling
Feature completed: Implement functionality to view all saved affirmations in a scrollable list with proper empty state handling
Starting work on feature: Support multi-line text input and display for affirmations
Feature completed: Support multi-line text input and display for affirmations
Starting work on feature: Implement drag-and-drop reordering of affirmations in the list view
Session ended - progress saved
Starting work on feature: Implement drag-and-drop reordering of affirmations in the list view
Session ended - progress saved
Starting work on feature: Create AffirmationRepository for CRUD operations with Hive, abstracting storage implementation
Feature completed: Create AffirmationRepository for CRUD operations with Hive, abstracting storage implementation
Starting work on feature: Implement GetRandomAffirmation use case that selects a random active affirmation, avoiding immediate repetition
Feature completed: Implement GetRandomAffirmation use case that selects a random active affirmation, avoiding immediate repetition
Starting work on feature: Implement settings storage for theme, refreshMode, and language preferences using Hive
Feature completed: Implement settings storage for theme, refreshMode, and language preferences using Hive
Starting work on feature: Implement export functionality to save affirmations to a text file
